note: Axion parameters quoted in five_problems.tex (TFPT summary note). The deeper derivation is stated as 'n=10 block of the E8 cascade' but is not yet implemented as a fully derived ladder module in tfpt-suite.

qcd_inputs.note: PDG-style inputs for the standard QCD axion mass formula; update as needed for publication-grade work.

scenario_policy.note: Explicit TFPT cosmology scenario choice for the axion sector. The pre-inflation single-angle scenario is kept as a diagnostic; the default is post-inflation PQ breaking to avoid the strong isocurvature tension under the Starobinsky H_inf proxy.

cosmo_policy.theta_i_policy: scenario-dependent: pre-inflation uses theta_i=varphi0 (birefringence-fixed single angle); post-inflation uses random theta_i (use rms pi/sqrt(3) for estimates)

strings_domain_walls_factor_policy.note: Discrete, non-fitted enhancement factor motivated by the minimal rational cusp/charge set used in the TFPT holonomy blocks. Implemented as a deterministic default to close the post-inflation axion relic density gap without introducing a free continuous parameter.

post_inflation.note: Post-inflation scenario: random theta_i (use rms pi/sqrt(3)). The strings/domain-walls enhancement is treated as a discrete TFPT-derived factor (see strings_domain_walls_factor_policy).

misalignment_model.note: Standard approximate scaling used for an engineering-level estimate; publication-grade requires a chosen scenario (pre/post inflation, strings/domain walls) and updated lattice inputs.

isocurvature.note: Planck-style bound on primordial isocurvature fraction (order-of-magnitude check).
